title: Wild card weekend
author: VD
content_html:
Here’s what the weighted DVOA at Football Outsiders calls for this weekend:

Jacksonville over Pittsburgh
Tampa over the Giants
Seattle over Washington
San Diego over Tennessee


On the other hand, here’s predictions based on the resident NFL conspiracy theorist’s theory of gameday choreography:

Steelers
Giants
Seahawks
Chargers


I’m going with the Jags, Bucs, Skins and Chargers.
content_text:
Here’s what the weighted DVOA at Football Outsiders calls for this weekend:
Jacksonville over Pittsburgh
Tampa over the Giants
Seattle over Washington
San Diego over Tennessee
On the other hand, here’s predictions based on the resident NFL conspiracy theorist’s theory of gameday choreography:

I’m going with the Jags, Bucs, Skins and Chargers.
